thread.section_title: Unilibro.it Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Unilibro.it | www.unilibro.it
thread.title: scorbutico

author: scorbutico
title: scorbutico
text:
A great range of books and other items such as DVDs at very competitive prices, and I was very happy with my order which was made before Christmas and all arrived in time.
A slight problem was the checkout which didn't include the discount that I was entitled to and so had to claim back later (it was paid back immediately so well done to Unilibro for that).
The system for contacting them is poor as you are forced to use the contact form and no email address is supplied, and when you get a reply you cannot respond to that reply but have to go back to the contact form again, not very customer friendly.
Overall, I will definitely shop with them again.
